promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a chibi cute epic boar fire-type pokemon wearing a regal crystal headband. It can be found in desert-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, fire or boar. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Crystalusk, a a chibi cute epic boar fire-type pokemon. It can be found in desert-like environments It has the following abilities: Heat Typhoon, Luring Flame. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "boar", "fire" or "Crystalusk". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of fire-type pokemon, boar-like, epic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, blue and red ambient lighting
generatedDescription: This petite swine sparkler, found in arid zones, creates Heat Typhoons and casts Luring Flames. An adorable yet formidable companion.
